name: FAST PLANE ✈
description:
Oh no! There’s been a traffic jam and all the hover planes are blocking the way to your job interview! Luckily you prepared for this in advance. Meet Fast Plane: Your one-stop solution for avoiding any stalled or crashed planes that may block off the road ahead. With these new mechanical legs, your plane has become an all-terrain vehicle with excellent style to boot. 

So what are you waiting for?! 

Those legs were made for running!

Title: Fast Plane

Platform: PC Game

Rating: E

Target Market: 6+ Casual Gamers

Use the arrow keys to jump and duck. Fuel orbs give bonus points. Don’t crash!

Leslie Graff - Game Designer
